culminating

Class PBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • culminating.MovingObject
      • culminating.PBullet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PBullet
extends MovingObject
    This class implements a flashing bullet. Feel free to change this, implement a new object, change the animation, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PBullet(double x, double y, int left, int right, int top, int bottom, boolean bounce)
      Calls the superclass constructor, plus sets radius, and flash parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PBullet

        public PBullet(double x,
               double y,
               int left,
               int right,
               int top,
               int bottom,
               boolean bounce)
        Calls the superclass constructor, plus sets radius, and flash parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location.
        y - The y location.
        left - The left edge.
        right - The right edge.
        top - The top edge.
        bottom - The bottom edge.

    • Method Detail

        public void animateOneStep()
        Controls the animation parameters. (Called once every time the bullet position is updated.)
